--- ### @mixin reset #### Arguments | Name | Type | Default | | ---- | ---- | ------- | | `margin` | `string` | `0` | | `padding` | `string` | `0` | | `list-style` | `string` | `none` | | `border` | `string` | `none` | | `background` | `string` | `transparent` | #### SCSS {% highlight css %} .foo { @include reset; } {% endhighlight %} #### CSS {% highlight css %} .foo { margin: 0; padding: 0; list-style: none; border: none; background: transparent; } {% endhighlight %}
